TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicResourceExtensionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 从分析的 XAML 转换为 ，并支持从 XAML 中进行动态资源引用。

span.span: Converts from parsed XAML to and supports dynamic resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不涉及生成资源引用通过 XAML 或代码的典型方案通常需要引用的类型转换器。Referencing the type converter is not typically necessary for typical scenarios that involve making resource references either from XAML or code. 有关此类型转换器支持标记扩展的详细信息，请参阅[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。For more information about the markup extension that this type converter supports, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destinationType` 应为类型; 如果不是，然后实现则基于 (，这可能会引发异常)。`destinationType` is expected to be type ; if not, then the implementation falls through to base (, which may throw an exception).
